The '''''Minecraft'' x LUSH collection''' is a merchandise collection and collaboration between [[Mojang Studios]] and British cosmetics retailer {{w|LUSH}}.<ref>{{mcnet|minecraft-x-lush|Minecraft x LUSH|August 6, 2024|Cristina Anderca}}</ref><ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.trendhunter.com/trends/minecraft-x-lush|title=Pixelated Bath Bombs|author=Laura McQuarrie|website=TREND HUNTER|date=August 7, 2024}}</ref> The collection was announced on August 1, 2024,<ref>{{tweet|Minecraft|1819060936021270893|ðŸ«§ Craft your calm ðŸ«§ Craft a moment of calm with the limited-edition Minecraft x LUSH collection. Relax with blocky, fizzing bath bombs IRL, and craft some in-game with the LUSH Bath Bombs add-on. Products available in LUSH stores and online across UK&I and North America on 8.12.24  LUSH Bath Bombs add-on available today: https://aka.ms/MinecraftLush|August 1, 2024}}</ref> released online on August 6, 2024, and began rolling out to LUSH stores on August 12, 2024. Twelve products were released as part of the collection.<ref>{{Citation|url=https://hypebeast.com/2024/8/lush-minecraft-summer-collection-2024-release-info|title=Build Your Summer Self-Care Routine with New LUSH x â€˜Minecraftâ€™ Collab|author=Lush|website=Hypebeast|date=August 12, 2024}}</ref>
